author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
Awareness through ‘kolam’

As part of the ongoing initiatives by the district administration to create awareness of enrolment to electoral roll and the importance of voting, ‘kolam’ competitions were held across the district on Thursday. Women self-help groups (SHG) from all the 420 panchayats across 13 panchayat unions in the district participated in the competitions in their respective villages. ‘Kolams’ depicting the importance of exercising the right to vote were drawn by the participants. B. Rohini Ramdas, Additional Collector and Project Officer of District Rural Development Agency (DRDA), and P. Selvaraj, Executive Engineer (DRDA), participated in the awareness campaign in some of the villages.
title: Kolam competition for voter awareness
